评论概述: The Perfect Blend of Comfort and Style
评论详情: These pants are an absolute wardrobe staple! The lack of a cuff at the bottom gives them a polished look, making them easy to dress up for work or a night out, but they’re just as perfect for lounging or running errands. Fits true to size.  The stretchy, soft material makes them incredibly comfortable—I could wear them all day without any fuss. I love them so much that I now have them in multiple colors, and every pair fits like a dream.  If you’re looking for versatile pants that combine style and comfort, these are a must-have. Highly recommend grabbing more than one!
Extremely comfortable, quality material
Well made, soft fabric.  True to size.

I knew this runs short and is good for petite but wow, it is shorter than I expected (I am only 5'1"). I wore it for the first time yesterday on the plane and it's mostly comfortable. The main reason I docked off 1 star is the pants do tend to ride up a bit onto my calves when I sit, which could get cold if the plane (or wherever I am) temperature is low.

I have 4 or 5 pairs of these and wear them practically every day. They are soft and comfortable but dog hair doesn't cling to it like cotton or leggings. They're stetchy yet tight in the right places. Way better than any name brand version I have of similar styles. Doesnt shrink, decent pocket sizes and high value for cost.

Great for golf in cooler weather. I wash on delicate cycle and hang to dry. They dry in hours and no wrinkles. I'm 5'3" and the regular length hits me around my ankles.  I have them in black and grey.
These are the most comfortable pants I own! I am just shy of 5’ and the petite fit perfectly, just the right length. Wish they had more colors available in petite options!

评论概述: These pants are not like they used to be
评论详情: I got my first pair of these pants around 3 years ago. Similar to the many reviews, I got them because they are stretchy, comfy, and thick. They hold their shape really well and look good. I just bought another pair ( one size bigger to be able to wear thermals under) and they are so different. Although they materials say they are the same, these new pants are thinner, do not hold their shape as the older pants, the color is not as dark , and they have a slightly shine to them. For the price, I would NOT recommend these pants as I have gotten similar thickness/ pants for less money. I got these because they are thicker than other joggers/pants but the new ones are a disappointment.

评论概述: Feels like silk on your body
评论详情: Love these pants. Comfortable, quality material, hefty quality fabric w/o being hit bc it’s breathable. The color is a bit dull but it’s ok. These pants are office casual with yoga comfort. They feel so good to slip into.

评论概述: I love these pants! Fit great, comfortable. Perfect for each day. Dress up or down.
评论详情: Buy them now
These were a clingy, uncomfortable material and the fit was weird. I returned them.
Good quality fabric, great fit
Distribution on point. Little dressey. Beautiful fit.

I have started wearing these instead of jeans..I am 71 5ft 4 and 190 lbs..these look so much better than jeans ..no lumps or bumps showing and soo comfortable..I have 4 pr of these..I wear a xl..they wash and dry great also. I just love them. The fabric is so soft and feels so good on.

This is a great pair of ankle pants they can be used as a jogger or as dress pants.  Thin fabric that breathes, shines enough to make it look sleek.  I’m short so ankle pants fit as regular pants.  So comfy
They fit true to size and are VERY cozy!  Just what I wanted.
This one did not fit great. The Small was a bit too big on me. The fabric feels substantial, and the pants are well made.

I bought these for golf and travel.  Hot days my skin was soaked and felt like everyone could see how much a was sweating!!  Wrinkled horrible, especially for packing.  Size was good, length I wasn’t picky about could have been shorter or longer
Use it to travel, find it very comfortable.
So comfortable

These are cute, lightweight, super stretchy, and soft, which is exactly what I need for a long haul flight. The fabric is such that I could hand wash and dry fast. I am tall so they look a little cropped/high-water-ish on me, which is exactly what I like. Just ordered them in a second color.

I’m 5’3” and 140 lbs with athletic legs. I ordered a large, and while it’s a bit loose in the waist, the drawstring helps tighten it, so it’s not a problem. The pants fit well overall and aren’t too snug on my thighs. The length hits just on my ankles. I can’t speak about the durability or how well they’ll hold up after washing yet, but I love these pants so far. I bought them in black.

I love these pants and the subtle camo print. They are  true to size & very comfortable. The only negative (& why I only gave 4 ⭐️) was waiting for them to arrive. It took over a week and there was a delay.
I just purchased my second pair after having the first pair for about 4 years. These are very nice quality and I can get away with wearing them to work.
Very quality material, stretch nicely and fit perfectly! Very comfortable and expensive look! Bought two pairs already!

I absolutely love these pants. I have been wearing the black ones for at least 2 years and I just bought the navy blue as they finally make them in XS. I am 5'3", 107 and the XS fit great. I dress these up or down. The black pair is pilling some and look a little run down but I have worn them at least 100 times and have washed them a bunch. I will definitely keep buying these!

I bought these pants several months ago but just tried them out on our most recent trip. They are FABULOUS travel pants and honestly will be great for running errands, going out to eat, shopping, etc. They are extremely comfortable, look great on, and are as comfortable, if not more so, than leggings! I highly recommend!!!

I absolutely love these pants! They are very comfortable but also are cute for a casual outfit. I really like the slightly loose looking fit. I wear them all the time! I will definitely be purchasing more!

These are my favorite pants and perfect for almost everywhere. I wore these to court, work, dates, errands you name it.  Even have gained weight and they still flatter me. I bought size small petite, 5’3, 130-150lbs and they’re still my favorite pair of pants. Please make more color options in petite!!
I’m 5’3 and these fit really well, the length is perfect if you’re short.
Great fit and so comfy. The fabric is very shiny which makes them look cheap.

The elastic they use on the waistband is way too tight. Even if I went up a size, it still wouldnt change anything. Perhaps these just run REALLY small in the waist… Rest of the fit was fine. Light and comfortable.
These petite small pants fit perfectly. They travel well without wrinkling. So they always look good and can be dressed up or down. Good for every day and or travel.

Love these pants! I appreciate the fact that they come in a petite version. The fabric is buttery and has a good amount of stretch. I am between a medium and a large (5’3”, 160lbs), but I’m glad I sized up since I didn’t want them to be too fitted.
I was surprised how cheap these were but they were cheap so.....they are very shiny too so I didn't like the look at all. I don't recommend.
This has been  love at first try, I'm petite and it fits perfect! I will be ordering more. I did go one size up based on reviews. The details make it so much better. Get it ladies!!
Just as pictured. True to size and oh so comfortable
Great fit for we shorter ladies; have a little weight so not for really hot weather
So comfy for a long airplane ride.  I am 5’3’ and they go to my ankles.

I bought three different "yoga"/"work" pants to see which one is best. The Ajisai brand runs small; I usually wear size M (8/10) but needed a size L based on reviews, which turned out to be a good choice. The fit is right, though their sizing is off. The quality is comparable to other gym clothes. (My second choice)  The YYV brand has a unique style with a fake zipper flap, a small cut at the bottom of the legs, giving it a smart-casual look, and no elastic waistband. The fit around the waist is great and doesn’t restrict breathing, and the sizing is accurate. Petite friendly. (My first choice)  The CRZY Yoga brand has a tie-waist style like Ajisai. it’s not ideal for petite people as the length is too long and the waistband is too high. (My third choice)  Overall, all the pants are made of similar, stretchable material and can be styled as lounge wear, airport wear, or smart-casual outfits. Good pants for all seasons.
I usually wear XL so that’s what I ordered but for like a medium
Very comfortable and great travel pant. Unfortunately no back pockets

A great pair of casual/yoga pants. Perfect for travel, an informal workplace, or any everyday activity. Quality fabric, finished seams, deep pockets that are tacked down at both ends of the opening. Very nice at a good price point. I returned them only because I thought they made my hips look too wide. :)
liked comfort
I bought two.  They are durable and so comfortable especially over my menopause pouch!  I’m 5’3 and wanted an above ankle length.  These are awesome
Title says it all - looks cheap. Instantly returned

These pants are well made but there is no stretch in the fabric.  They run small with elastic that is even smaller than the pants.  I am 5 ft tall and weigh 125 pounds and the medium was too small.  I could wear them but they would be very tight and uncomfortable.  I have sent them back…
These pants are so comfortable. They can be dressed up or down.  I need 5 more pairs!

Yoga pants as street-ware are over, but casual comfort isn’t. These are my new go-to. I purchased them to travel in, but realized as soon as I put them on that they are perfect for most occasions. Very comfortable. They look great on. Like other reviews said, a bit tight in the waist but I wear them all day and they aren’t digging in or making me uncomfortable so no complains. I’m 5’2” but have long legs so ordered the reg length and they fit like a standard pant length. I’m keeping these and also ordering the petite for the above ankle look.
Pricy but i purchased for travel!

评论概述: NICE PANTS! DRESS UP OR DOWN
评论详情: NICE LOOKING PANTS - ABLE TO DRESS UP OR DRESS DOWN - TTS

The fabric feels great - nice and stretchy, breathable and not too clingy. I felt comfortable, but also put together, on one of our first 80+ degree days.  I'm often between a medium and a large, and went with the large due to reviews. I'm glad I did because the waistband is quite tight - it's a thick elastic so it was comfortable and didn't fold over or create an unflattering "roll" but the medium would have been too small.

评论概述: A little different fit than the photo
评论详情: These show underwear lines bad! Unless you’re commando or thonging it the lines will show even with no show underwear. The midsection bunches up and fits weird I feel like it gives me a fupa even though I don’t have one. However, they are very breezy and lightweight, comfortable and a good length for even someone with long legs. They are okay. Not my fav but, they are okay.

评论概述: AJISAI Petite/Regular Women's 7/8 Joggers Travel Pants with Pockets Lounge Casual Stretch pants
评论详情: I really like this material. It's super soft & comfortable. I work in & out of the heat all day, they keep me cool & dry. (Florida) I bought the black and the gray. Blue was not available in Petite, so I ordered it in regular length. I like them too! I wish they came in white & more colors. These are so comfortable and cute. I wear to work with a short sleeve Henley. I've also styled it with a beach sneaker and a quick dry sport top. Don't hesitate, you won't regret! For reference, I'm 5'3.5" I ordered 2 in petite large and they fit like a true 7/8 pant, that is they're above the ankle and show off your shoe! The regular large came to the top of my sneaker, not too long, not too short. I have an apple 🍎  shape. I normally wear a medium in this type (stretch waist band) but ordered L & PL based on reviews.
Great value quality was good.  Thought they ran too big.

Love these pants, promptly ordered a second pair. Ordered the xl petite & the fit is fantastic. Perfect capri slim. Waist band is wider, nice give. The material is a thicker, but breathable & large pockets! Very slimming, flattering cut & comfortable. Win, win, win!

评论概述: The material and color is *chefs kiss*
评论详情: Love the material, it’s cooling, smooth and a beautiful color. Love the stitching and loose straight fit. I think it’ll do wonderfully as an athleisure pant during the hot summer. Bought 2!

Comfortable and versatile. These are so comfortable and fit nice. Not too loose or tight. I wear them with both athletic shoes and dress shoes depending on the top. I have them in Grey, black and blue. I wear them almost every day. The length is nice. I like the 7/8 inch size. I have long legs and they hit right above my ankle. I wash them and hang dry. Great pants. Highly recommend. And nope not paid for my review.

I have a very short torso and thicker waist line ("apple shape") and these didn't work with my body type. I also didn't like where they fell on my legs (I'm 5'6") as it looked awkward. As far as quality these were fine but a little stiff material for lounging. I think they would work on a slimmer, straighter figure.

I bought these for traveling and they are light and comfortable and perfect for long plane/train rides (especially the drawstring waist )and don’t wrinkle and take up almost no room in my bag. They’re also perfect for everyday casual swear or even for a casual workplace.

I am 4’9” and these pants fit perfectly without alteration. Even though they are 7/8, I wear them to my ankles/shoes. They are flattering with a slim fit and the elastic waist holds the pants up even when there are items in the handy pockets. The fabric is safe but durable and overall very comfortable. I might buy a third pair.

I didn't want to wear these as flood pants, so I bought the regular rather than the petite option. I'm 5'1" with short legs and a short torso, and the length hit me just below the top of my foot. Love the natural waist even though it shows a bit of my belly.
Me encantó

I really like these pants, they have a lot of stretchy and a cooling effect to them. They are Capri length on me and I'm short. They do show panty lines though, if you wear regular bikini style underwear. And there's a drawstring so you can adjust the waist.
I’ve had these in my cart for years and I finally bought them. Wish I had not waited. Now I need them in more colors! I’m 5’4” and 118 pounds. I ordered the small petite and they fit perfectly!
I’ve purchased these in size M 3-4 times and LOVE them. Wear them lots. The last re-order has a newly-sized waist: a bit too tight. Curious. I will re-order a L and cross my fingers.
I received 2 pair..the black pair was wrinkled and stayed wrinkled even after washing..the gray pair were fine
I thought the fit and feel were great but the material is so shiny I felt like it was just shy of shiny pleather. I’m returning but wish the maker had another alternative.

These pants are SO comfortable and are perfect for travel.  They don’t look overtly casual and don’t wrinkle. I’m 5’6” and wear an 8/10, went with a Large Petite just to make sure I got the cropped look with the length and they’re perfect.  If you’re between sizes in the waist I would go up, if you’re between sizes in length I would go down.
Love these for travel!
Great pants and size: Comfortable to wear to work and for relaxing
I'm returning these pants because the fabric is too shiny and cheap-looking, The size is accurate and they are comfortable, just not my style.

评论概述: Love these for my petite frame!
评论详情: These are perfect! Short enough for my little legs, not too tight or loose. My only issue is they don't have any of the lighter colors in the Petite Small. For reference, I am 4'10" tall and weigh 105 lbs. If I went with the XS, I believe the waist would be too tight. Even though it is elastic, it is rather snug.
Love that they are truly petite. Though one pair pilled. Any one else have that happen?
I love that these come in petite sizes! Going to order them in every color!

评论概述: Great dupe! Better than expensive pair.
评论详情: I’m 5’2 120lbs. I bought a Small Petite and it’s perfect. Doesn’t not cling to my thighs. I bought 2 pair and wish the petite came in more colors. I like this better than a similar pair of pants from Athleta. All I want to wear are these pants.

评论概述: Quality fabric, but the sizing varies wildly
评论详情: I have a dark olive pair I bought a few years ago that I LOVE. Tried buying black and navy, and they all fit differently. Fabric is thick, waistband is sturdy but comfortable.
These are so comfortable but still look nice enough to wear to work if you dress them up!!
Difficult to understand clerk
Gave 4 only because didn't expect the waste band to be so large and thick. The pants are breezy and comfortable

评论概述: Cute pants but waistband is too small
评论详情: I bought these pants in navy . The material is soft and stretchy and the  pockets are a nice touch . However I feel it runs small in the elastic waistband . I typically wear a size 8/10 in jeans and pants but ordered a large in these pants in case the medium was clingy . I’m not sure if I’ll keep these since the waist just feels too tight .
Great fit and so comfortable! Can be worn to work with a sweater or top for a casual look.

Fit was ok but super wrinkled and shiny. Material should have been more structured like a hiking pant and then these would be perfect. Shine makes them look cheap.was looking for this fit and length but different material. The pictures for it don’t show shine and it’s misleading.
I love the silky feel of these pants. Very comfortable and easy pull on. Will be great for travel. The ankle length is good, I’m 5’8”.

These leisure pants are stylish, well made, and comfortable. They are also quite affordable. They will become a wardrobe staple for me. It is rare that I find a pair of pants that meet these criteria. A keeper for sure!

评论概述: My favorite but petites always out of stock!
评论详情: These are my favorite travel pants. I'm only 5'2" and need the petites, but they always seem to be out of stock. I tried the regular 27" and had to return them.  This fabric is thick, smooth, doesn't pill, and drapes well.  I'm 122lbs, 35-30-36 and have bought both the PS and PM, depending on how loose I want them.

I purchased a pair of these pants in brown. They come pretty wrinkled, which is fine, but then when you get rid of wrinkles you see that the dye as settled in these creases giving you long dark lines down your leg. I thought it was a one time flaw, so I ordered a second pair. These have the same dye problem. Poor quality management.

I love the way these fit me compared to all the other styles on Amazon! I wish they would make more colors so I could buy them. I have bought many different kinds because of the pretty colors offered but they don’t fit or look as great on me as these. MORE COLORS!
The waist is to small.

Love these pants!  I'm 5'5" and a medium.  I bought regular length and petite.  Reg fits like reg pants and petite fit like ankle length.  Will wear petite length with sandals or sneakers in the Spring and Summer. They look great and are really comfortable.  Highly recommend.
Están muy cómodos y presentables.
I am petite and it is SO hard finding joggers that are a good length. These were perfect. I wear them all the time, so comfy!!!

评论概述: Traveled all over the world with these pants
评论详情: I LOVE these pants. I have three pairs of black and gray and tripped and tore them in vietnam :(. I have had them for 2.5 years. I am an xs 5'5 and 119 lbs. Purchasing in other colors. The only negative is they slide down and I have to pull them up to my waist LOL. Buy them, great for the price.

I bought these pants specifically for travel and they did not disappoint me. They are so comfortable and flattering.  I ended up wearing them for more then just travel on the trip and will be buying more.
Love these pants. I was a little hesitant to order them but they’re love the fit and softness of the fabric.

评论概述: Elastic waist band is really large
评论详情: The joggers were full length on me even though they are petite.  I find the elastic waistband excessively wide 2”.  Prior reviews indicate that the product runs small and suggest sizing up - this is true.  I kept the pants but would not purchase again.

I really like these pants! I have it in two colors and it is very flattering on my build. I’m slender, around 115 pounds, 5’21/2 and it fits me perfectly. They are just the right length, comfortable and not too light or heavy. My only hope is that the company would offer it in more colors because it is limited. I ordered another brand similar to this which I like too, however the length is just a tad short. These are just the right length for me. I especially like wearing them when I golf and travel. Give it a try!

These pants fit great - the fabric is super soft & dry quickly & they are very flattering! Not like your average sweatpants! Looking forward to taking them on a trip to Texas! Ordered 2 more pairs in different colors!
I'm 5'1" and about 155#.  These are a size XL petite.  I think they fit good. The fabric is kind of silky and on the thin side.  Very very comfortable!
I’m 5’1 and this length was too short. Would rebuy the longer length if I need thin pants like this.
